wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Wilfred Cockshott (14 November 1915 – 3 February 1979) was an English composer, librettist, writer and teacher.

response: Grace Williams composed Sea Sketches in 1944, while living in Hampstead, London. Shortly after completing the work Williams wrote to Gerald Cockshott, in 1945, saying "I don't want to stay in London – I just long to get home and live in comfort by the sea." She returned to her home town of Barry in south Wales, two years later.
*Gerald Cockshott (1915–1979), English composer, librettist, writer, and teacher
